live_updates: Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
41222.summary: Some customers in Leduc are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
41222.title: Aug 30 – Leduc | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
